TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1046
TEI.2.document_title: Edmund Andrews to James F Perry, 02-22-1834

barker_notes.barker_summary: Edmund Andrews to James F. Perry, February 22, 1834. Commerce.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1046

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Edmund Andrews to James F. Perry, February 22, 1834. Commerce.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="02-22-1834">Feby 22d 1834*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*James F Perry Esq,*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Your Esteemed favour under *date_mentioned n="02-21-1834">yesterdays date*/date_mentioned* has been received and I have delivered *person_mentioned*Simon */person_mentioned*Six Hoes of his own choice. We have no information of *person_mentioned*Col. Austin*/person_mentioned* since you was here*/p*
*p*I have heard that *person_mentioned*McQueen */person_mentioned*has gone into the *location_mentioned*interior */location_mentioned*to hear [what] was become of him but of this I am not certain *person_mentioned*Mr Williams*/person_mentioned* Expected now here and we may here something then*/p*
*p*I have charged the hoes to you with the understanding you are to pay by crediting *person_mentioned*Capt H Austin*/person_mentioned* with them*/p*
*p*I have not heard anything from *person_mentioned*Dick */person_mentioned*yet. Nor have I found any one that is willing to work. I am in hope to make a sale for *person_mentioned*Capt H Austin*/person_mentioned* to help him out. You I suppose have heard of *person_mentioned*Hunter Smiths overseer*/person_mentioned* being drowned at *location_mentioned*Bolivar */location_mentioned*it happend when *person_mentioned*Capt H. A*/person_mentioned* was with me—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Edmund Andrews*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*James F Perry Esq*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Peach Point */location_mentioned* pr *person_mentioned*Simon*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
